paradocks::FitnessError

paradocks::FitnessError Class Reference
[ParaDockS Fitness function Interface]

Fitness error class. This class should be thrown by all implemented Fitness classes in case of an error. Derived from std::runtime_error. More...

#include <fitness.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Fitness error class. This class should be thrown by all implemented Fitness classes in case of an error. Derived from std::runtime_error.
